boolean.title: boolean input
boolean.description: Boolean inputs show a on/off toggle. In this example, the toggle has the label 'Opt in'

string.title: string input
string.description: String inputs show a text input

number.title: number input
number.description: Number inputs show a text input that is restricted to entering numbers

auto complete.title: autocomplete input
auto complete.description: Autocomplete inputs show a text input that autocompletes to the options specified in the jsonata expression

select.title: select input
select.description: Select inputs show a drop-down selection with the options specified in the jsonata expression

multi select.title: multi select input
multi select.description: Multi Select inputs show a drop-down selection with the options specified in the jsonata expression. Multiple options can be selected yielding an array of values
